data.eml:eml: Singhiella melanolepis, a new species of whitefly (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae) from Taiwan with remarks on the genus Singhiella Sampson

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Young-Fa, Ko, Chiun-Cheng (2007): Singhiella melanolepis, a new species of whitefly (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae) from Taiwan with remarks on the genus Singhiella Sampson. Zootaxa 1390: 1-16, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175204
